timeline.author: sabieber
sabieber

timeline.message: Adds a ticket for an open TODO.

Actually generates the new URIs for touch tracking.

In order to track which blob has been accessed,
we implemented a new URI scheme in the BlobDispatcher
which also accepts the blobKey as parameter to perform
the required tacking.

This adds the required parameter to the generated URL.

Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: jmuscireum <31538484+jmuscireum@users.noreply.github.com>
